name: B.E.T. Phase Change
text: Remove counters from 1 "B.E.S." monster you control with 2 or more counters until it has 1 remaining, then reveal "B.E.S." monsters in your hand and/or target "B.E.S" monsters in your GY up to the number of counters removed; Special Summon those monsters, and if you do, you cannot summon monsters this turn, except "B.E.S" monsters. You can banish this card from your GY; Set 1 "B.E." Spell/Trap card from your Deck, except "B.E.T. Phase Change". You can only use one effect of "B.E.T. Phase Change" per turn, and only once that turn.
